str2: From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
Infant, babe, child in arms. Of uncertain affinity; an infant literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Sacred, holy, set apart. Of uncertain affinity; sacred.
From grapho; a writing, i.e. A letter, note, epistle, book, etc. plural learning.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Neuter Plural
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
From sophos; to render wise; in a sinister acceptation, to form 'sophisms', i.e. Continue plausible error.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Feminine of a derivative of soter as noun; rescue or safety.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.
